message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with error correction in index coding, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and data structures (cs.DS) as well as coding theory (cs.CC). The concept of side information (SI) is also central to the paper. Additionally, the paper discusses the decoding process, which falls under the category of network information theory (cs.NI).
